title: Wall Street Breakfast September 27: Chevron, BP Stop Output At Some Gulf Of Mexico Facilities Ahead Of Hurricane Ian
author: Seeking Alpha

description: Chevron, BP stop output at some Gulf of Mexico facilities ahead of hurricane. Dollar creates an 'untenable situation' for risk assets - Morgan Stanley.
